Loops are dynamic discussion spaces centered around specific themes. Share videos, get reactions, and enjoy engaging comments from the community.
Ready to Start Your First Loop?

Reply sent! 
You'll see the conversation in 
your inbox once they've 
responded back.
Uh-oh. We can\'t connect to your internet. \nPlease check your internet and try again.
Repost interesting videos to your Loops to share the love!\n\nOnly Collaborators can post in Loops, and a video can only be shared once per loop.
You\'ve seen all new videos from the Loops you are collaborating on. Check out these other Loops where you can collaborate.
When you subscribe to a Loop, you\'ll see the videos posted in the Loop here.
When you collaborate on Loops, you\'ll see the videos posted in the Loop here.
You\'ve seen all new videos from the Loops you subscribed. Check out these other Loops that you can subscribe to.
You\'ve seen all new videos from the Loops you subscribed. Explore other trending content in ‘For You’ feed or check back later for updates.
You\'ve seen all new videos from the Loops you are collaborating on. Explore other trending content in ‘For You’ feed or check back later for updates.
Uh-oh. We can\'t connect to your internet. Please check your internet and try again.

Try a different search term 
or 
create a video to let the community 
know what you're looking for.
Video has been saved to gallery
This user is no longer on Genuin.
The Community you are looking is no longer available.

Loops are video groups for discussing specific topics. Add videos to share with audiences, who watch, react, and comment to stay up-to-date.\n\nWhen you start or collaborate on a Loop, you\'ll see updates posted here.
Oops, it looks like you are removing all the members in the group. You should atleast have one member in the conversation apart from you.
You scanned @%s\'s QR code.\nYou can now record and publish a\ngenuin video for their profile.
Group conversations allow you (\u2022) and a group of other people to talk about anything using videos. Group conversations are private and cannot be seen other than by its members.
Please record an introductory video to invite everyone to the group conversation

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum. How WFH is transforming the work culture?
Allow Genuin to access your\ncamera and microphone
Questions asked to this Loop’s Collaborators by other Collaborators and subscribers will appear here.
All the Collaborators of this Loop will be notified to answer this question.
Genuin videos are visible to everyone on and off Genuin. They appear on feed, explore, on your profile and in search results.

Loops are public groups dedicated to discussing specific topics. Collaborators share videos, and anyone can follow along and comment.\n\nAll Loops are unlisted by default and can be made visible to everyone on and off Genuin.
Record more than 1 sec of video.
This conversation will be deleted from yours and the other person\'s inbox.
You won\'t be able to add a topic to this video again.
You won\'t be able to add a question to this video again.
You won\'t be able to get this clip back.
Are you sure you want to \nremove this video from the Saved Videos?
Are you sure you want\nto start-over?
If you go back now, you\'ll lose all the changes you\'ve made.
Your video is being uploaded. To upload faster, keep the app open.
To publish a video, it must be at least 4 secs long. Try recording a longer video.
To send a video, it must be at least 4 secs long. Try recording a longer video.
Are you sure you want to start-over?
You have not allowed application to access storage. Kindly allow it from settings in order to download video.
Genuin needs access to your gallery.
Genuin needs permission to open gallery. To continue you will need to allow storage access from settings.
Tell the community a few things about yourself
Try a topic, theme, or idea.
Tell your viewers what your conversation will be about.
We will notify you when the Loop is\navailable to share. Keep the app open to\nupload the video faster.
Tap here to change the visibility of this post
You have not allowed application to access camera. Kindly allow it from settings in order to click photo.
Choose a frame from your video to set as cover image
